name: Digital Product Ideas - Notion Template
description: Are you ready to start your journey as a digital entrepreneur or side hustler, but don't know what to offer your audience? Don't worry, I'm here to help. With my free list of 99+ innovative digital product ideas, you'll have plenty of inspiration to create products that your audience will love.Best of all, you can earn money without resorting to the usual e-books or online courses. Unlock the potential of these 99+ lesser-known, yet profitable ideas that only a select few have on their radar.Dig
features: ✅ Getting ideas for innovative digital products; ✅ Finding your true niche (Ikigai); ✅ Organizing your tasks and side projects; ✅ Provides a list of useful mental models you need to know as a digital creator; ✅ Provides you with a list of No-Code tools you can use to skyrocket your productivity and scale your business; ✅ Motivates you with a daily inspirational quote; ✅ Task Management System; ✅ Ikigai Niche Calculator; ✅ List of Digital Product Ideas; ✅ Book Recommendations for Digital Creators
